data.title: LAKC Class Sponsorship / Pit Spots 2023
data.meta_description: Sponsorship valid from 01/1/23 thru 12/31/23 Come join us for another exciting year of Kart Racing here in Southern California! Since 1985, the Los Angeles Karting Championship series has provided a ...
data.text:
Sponsorship valid from 01/1/23 thru 12/31/23

Come join us for another exciting year of Kart Racing here in Southern California!

Since 1985, the Los Angeles Karting Championship series has provided a family-friendly, sprint kart racing environment for all ages in the Southern California region. Our mission is to provide the most competitive, largest sprint kart classes in the region at the lowest prices in the industry. We are extremely proud of averaging over 2,000 competitive entries per year. Our series will operate this year from both the Adams Motorsports Park & new K1 Circuit kart tracks.

Class Sponsorship Benefits

Class Sponsor Package Price: $500 (Less than $56/race!!)

Class sponsorship's are available to supporting businesses & partners, as well as kart part retailers, and kart tuning services.

· Race day announcing

· (2) owner/employee pit passes per race

· Preferred pit location (a reserved pit spot is an additional $100-$275 ea.)

· Sponsor Name on class trophies

· Sponsor Logo on result sheets

· Sponsor Logo on the front page of the lakc.org website

· 16’ Race day flag with logo flown trackside at every race (New 2023 Sponsors, please send us your logos so we can have a flag made for you!)

NOTE: We have a limited number of Class Sponsorships available. These are assigned based on prior year support of the series. Once all of our classes are filled, any additional Sponsors will become an Associate Sponsor of the series. They will receive all of the same benefits except for the names of the trophies and results.

Race Schedule for 2023
